# HUD::SET_MINIMAP_FOW_DO_NOT_UPDATE

## Summary
Pass TRUE to be able to move the player arround without updating the fog of war map, Reset to FALSE once DONE. DO NOT FORGET TO RESET AFTER USE

## Parameters
* **BOOL** doNotUpdate
